options.label: Get ERC20 Token Supply
options.name: getErc20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the total supply of a ERC-20 token. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get ERC20 Token Balance
options.name: getErc20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the current balance of a ERC-20 token of an address. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Historical ERC-20 Token TotalSupply by ContractAddress & BlockNo [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalErc20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the historical amount of a ERC-20 token in circulation at a certain block height. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Historical ERC-20 Token Account Balance by ContractAddress & BlockNo [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalErc20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the balance of a ERC-20 token of an address at a certain block height. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Token Info [PRO]
options.name: getTokenInfo
options.description: Returns project information and social media links of an ERC-20/ERC-721 token.

options.label: Get ETHER Price
options.name: getEtherPrice
options.description: Returns the latest price of 1 ETHER.

options.label: Get Historical ETHER Price [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalEtherPrice
options.description: Returns the historical price of ETHER.
